structure.unit: ARTICLE XXII. PERSONAL INJURY PROTECTION MEDICAL PROVIDERS

text.section:
Sec. 8A-425. Additional Registration Compliance Requirements.
PIP Medical Provider registration is nontransferable and cannot be assigned. Whenever ownership or management of a PIP Medical Provider changes, a new application must be filed and all applicable fees paid.
A valid business tax receipt must be maintained by the PIP Medical Provider.
Any Department designee, code enforcement officer, law enforcement officer, or any other persons authorized to enforce County ordinances must be allowed access for inspection of the PIP Medical Provider premises at any reasonable hour without prior notice.
